snippet: Investors found few reasons to keep pushing up share prices, with major indexes barely touching record high.
abstract: Stocks gain as many investors remain optimistic economy will start to accelerate after cold winter; Standard & Poor's 500-stock index flirts with new milestone of 1,900.
lead_paragraph: Investors found few reasons to keep pushing up share prices, with major indexes barely touching record high.

headline.main: S.&P. Sidles Up to 1,900, but Slips Below
headline.print_headline: S.&P. Sidles Up to 1,900, but Slips Below
